casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rama Dion Benjamin CRUMP 151PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 8, 2019 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Crump, Ramar Dion Benjamin.

James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill.

Peter A. Regulski, Assistant Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*693The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of May 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of May 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 10th day of June 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
